bioghist.p: Possibly formed in 1856 (4th annual meeting was held in 1860) and one of the founding clubs of the Schuylkill Navy, the Independent Barge Club was dissolved during the Civil War.

scopecontent.p: Minute book of the Independent Barge Club, 1859-1863. The minutes record the club's monthly, annual, and special meetings and document elections, changes to the constitution and by-laws, and financial and membership matters. The minutes also include a description of the club's uniform. At the back of the volume is a roll of members with a record of their attendance at meetings. Inserted in the volume are an invitation to a meeting and a copy of a letter rescinding the membership of D.S. Craven.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
